Moving the class using the Move refactoring works fine.

The try/finally is good, but if someone is ending or transferring the rule from
within that block it will cause this error.  I think a reproducible test case is
needed to track this down any further.

Also, if ResourcesPlugin.getWorkspace().getRoot() fails or indeed beginRule()
fails, the endRule() in the finally block will fail an exception, and the new
exception will also mask the original exception.

Unfortunately, I am not able to reproduce the exception.

Without a reproducible case there is not enough detail here to investigate
further. Closing. Please reopen if you reproduce.
